purpose: To enable users to build and manage a team of AI agents for various tasks using Autogen
principle: Utilizes Autogen framework to orchestrate and manage multiple AI agents
reusability: Designed for composability with support for Azure services, provides templates and examples for easy integration
limitations: Primarily tied to Azure ecosystem, early-stage development with potential stability issues
name: dream-team
description: This repo helps you to build a team of AI agents with Autogen
highlight: Facilitates the creation and coordination of AI agent teams using Autogen
